promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute strong lizard fire-type pokemon holding a dark hammer. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Smoldragon, a a chibi cute strong lizard fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: V-Flame. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "fire" or "Smoldragon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lizard-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Volcano dweller, Smoldragon warms its tiny, robust form with V-Flame. Despite its cuteness, it's a fierce contender in battles.
